attributes.action: The police and fire services should be recognised for their work during the riots
attributes.additional_details:
The riots of 2011 presented an unprecedented challenge to the emergency services which they handled with dignity, restraint, bravery and a great deal of professionalism.

These policemen and firefighters provided a worthy counterpoint to the thuggery and nihilism of the rioters and looters, and helped maintain a distance between civil British society and the criminality of the perpetrators.

The police and fire services should be recognised for this.
